Name: State of Anarchy
About the game: State of Anarchy is a simplistic top-down shooter that will put a smile on your face! The whole town has gone mad! Run as fast as you can! Shoot anything that moves! Do not release the gas pedal! Anarchy has never been so much fun! 'Annoyingly enjoyable. I laughed in spite of myself.' 'Looks and plays like the imagination of a small child. In a good way.' Features: Fast-paced run&gun action Hillarious hand-drawn graphics and mouth-made sound effects 10 weapons vs loads of enemies Character development system 2 game modes: Normal and Hardcore
Meta Title: State of Anarchy: Apr 27, 2016, Lapovich and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on State of Anarchy? Check out the release date (Apr 27, 2016), developer insights from Lapovich, and a complete game summary.
